Pre-Game Insights: The Lakers shot 50% last season, tying for the 2nd-best in the NBA, while the Pistons allowed opponents to shoot 49%, the 7th-worst in the NBA.
The Pistons allowed 15.4 offensive rebounds per game last season, the 5th-best in the NBA, while the Lakers averaged 14.1 offensive rebounds per game, the 2nd-worst in the NBA.
